titleStmt.title: The wonder of a kingdome. Written by Thomas Dekker
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Raworth, for Nicholas Vavasour; and are to bee sold at his shop in the Inner Temple, neere the church-doore,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Inner Temple, neere the church-doore
